item.title: Vlog Editor - Upwork
item.description:
I need an editor for a vlog. You must be able to show work you have done on similar projects. It will be a birthday vlog, so not too much footage. Please reach out if you feel like you are up for the job.

Budget: $85
Posted On: June 26, 2024 14:08 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing
Skills: Video Editing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States

item.title: Create 1-2 Minute Video Reviews of Amazon Products You Already Own - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking reliable and creative individuals to produce faceless video reviews of various Amazon products they already own. The ideal candidate will have access to a range of products, particularly in categories such as kitchen appliances/tools, vacuums, kids toys, yard equipment, recreation equipment, etc.

Responsibilities:
-Create high-quality faceless video reviews of Amazon products, ranging from 1 to 3 minutes in length.
-Ensure that the video showcases the product features and provides a clear understanding of how to use it.
-Familiarize yourself with the product details by reviewing Amazon product highlights and descriptions.
-Maintain excellent video quality to enhance the overall viewing experience


Requirements:
1. Each product featured should have a value of more than $25 on Amazon.
2. No food, clothing, medicines, or beauty products.
2. Submit the amazon link to the product along with the video review
3. Commitment to delivering high-quality video content

The audio does not need to be perfect in the video as it's going to be extracted and voiced-over.  However, you will still need to speak so we can follow a timeline and your guide to do the voiceover of the product features/how to use.

We are looking for 20 videos -$3 a video. These are faceless reviews with the audio voiced-over, so they shouldn't take long to complete.


Budget: $60
Posted On: June 26, 2024 13:58 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Testimonial Video, Explainer Video, Video Production, Social Media Marketing, Content Creation
Skills: Testimonial Video, Explainer Video, Video Production, Social Media Marketing, Content Creation
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
